onboarding.completedMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully completed all the onboarding steps. You are now ready to fully utilize the platform and take advantage of all its features. Start exploring and make the most of OneSila to drive innovation and success for your business.

createSupplier.title: Create a first supplier
createSupplier.details: Add your first supplier to assign products and create purchase orders.

createCustomer.title: Create a new customer
createCustomer.details: A customer is a company or consumer you sell to. You will later be able to make sales orders to this company.

createSupplierProduct.title: Add a new product for your supplier
createSupplierProduct.details: A supplier product represents the product or bill of material you buy. It will keep your stock and you can create products from it.

createFirstProduct.title: Create a first product
createFirstProduct.details: Products can be configurable, simple, bundled, manufacturable, or dropshipped.

addFirstSalesOrder.title: Add your first sales order
addFirstSalesOrder.details: Create a sales order to start selling products to your customers. This will help track your sales and manage inventory.

addFirstPurchaseOrder.title: Purchase some goods
addFirstPurchaseOrder.details: Create a purchase order to manage your purchases from suppliers. This will help keep your inventory stocked and manage supplier relationships.

addFirstInventory.title: Add your inventory
addFirstInventory.details: Add inventory entries to keep track of the stock levels of your products. This helps in managing and forecasting inventory needs.

inviteAnotherMember.title: Invite other team-members
inviteAnotherMember.details: Collaborate with your team to manage the business operations or data.

progress.details: Complete all the steps to become a master of OneSila and make the most of its features.

supplier.title: Create a first supplier
supplier.details: Add your first supplier to assign products and create purchase orders.

customer.title: Create a new customer
customer.details: A customer is a company or consumer you sell to. You will later be able to make sales orders to this company.

supplierProduct.title: Add a new product for your supplier
supplierProduct.details: A supplier product represents the product or bill of material you buy. It will keep your stock and you can create products from it.

product.title: Create a first product
product.details: Products can be configurable, simple, bundled, manufacturable, or dropshipped.

salesOrder.title: Add your first sales order
salesOrder.details: Create a sales order to start selling products to your customers. This will help track your sales and manage inventory.

purchaseOrder.title: Purchase some goods
purchaseOrder.details: Create a purchase order to manage your purchases from suppliers. This will help keep your inventory stocked and manage supplier relationships.

inventoryLocation.title: Add your inventory Location
inventoryLocation.details: Define your inventory locations to organize and manage where your products are stored. This helps in tracking stock levels across different locations and improves inventory accuracy.

inventory.title: Add your inventory
inventory.details: Add inventory entries to keep track of the stock levels of your products. This helps in managing and forecasting inventory needs.

member.title: Invite other team-members
member.details: Collaborate with your team to manage the business operations or data.

generateDemoData.title: Demo Data
generateDemoData.subTitle: Welcome to OneSila
generateDemoData.content: Do you want to create Demo Data?
generateDemoData.demoDataExplanation: Demo data is a set of fake data that helps you try the platform. It includes various sample entries to showcase the functionalities of OneSila.
generateDemoData.demoDataDeletionInfo: All and only the demo data can be deleted from your profile with a single click button.

addCompany.title: Company
addCompany.subTitle: Tell us a little about your company.
addCompany.content: We will use this information to show on all kinds of picking lists, order confirmations and more.

addCurrency.title: Currency
addCurrency.subTitle: Set up the currency you use by default.
addCurrency.content: This will help us track prices.  You can add more currencies later.

confirmVatRate.title: VAT Rate
confirmVatRate.subTitle: Set your company's VAT rate
confirmVatRate.content: We'll use this rate to raise invoices and caluclate prices. More rates can be added later.

createInventoryLocation.title: Inventory Location
createInventoryLocation.subTitle: Create a first inventory location.
createInventoryLocation.content: You can create a first location here. Eg Shelf 1 or Storage Unit. More can be added later - or you can skip this entirely.

mutationAlert.title: Are you sure?
mutationAlert.text: You won't be able to revert this!

toast.submitSuccessCreate: Your entry has been successfully created!
toast.submitSuccessUpdate: Your changes have been saved successfully!
toast.deleteSuccess: The item has been successfully deleted.
toast.unexpectedResult: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
toast.protectedDelete: Cannot delete this item because it is being used elsewhere.
toast.deletionFailed: Deletion operation failed. Please contact the administrators.
toast.clipboardSuccess: Your text was succefully copied to the clipboard

dropZone.multipleDraggingInstruction: Drag and drop files here or click to upload
dropZone.singleDraggingInstruction: Drag and drop a file here or click to upload

acceptInvitation.description: You are one step away. Please set you password and let's get it started!

login.description: Enter your username and password to login

register.description: Enter your username and password to register

company.languageDisclaimer: The company language CANNOT BE CHANGED LATER ON

recover.descriptionSent: An email was sent to the provided email. Please check the email for further instructions.
recover.descriptionCountdown: Your recovery link will expire in:
recover.description: Enter your email to recover your account
recover.tokenDescription: You are one step away. Please confirm your account recovery.

profile.unsavedChanges: You have unapplied changes. Are you sure you want to abort?

messages.unsavedChanges: You have unapplied changes. Are you sure you want to abort?

eanCodes.title: Ean Codes
eanCodes.generateSuccessfully: Ean code generation process started succefully! Come back in a few seconds to see your new ean codes.

assign.disclaimer: Wanna use a ean code from a supplier product? Just select one.
assign.assign: Wanna use an already existent ean code. Assign one very quick.
assign.release: You don't want to use the curren EAN Code anymore? Release it but keep in mind it will be marked as already used.
assign.error: You don't have any ean code to use neither external ean codes from the supplier products.
assign.errorSolution: Click here to generate new ean codes

placeholders.externalEanCode: Fill with the EAN code you have from the supplier

translation.confirmLanguageChange: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to change the language? This will discard any unsaved changes.
translation.successfullyUpdated: The product translation has been successfully updated.

addVariations.dragAndDrop: Use drag and drop or ➕ button to add new products

stepOne.content: Select what product are you trying to create?

variable.title: Simple
variable.example: Eg: A black pen that you buy and or sell.

bundle.title: Bundle
bundle.example: Eg: A notebook and pen sold together.

configurable.title: Configurable
configurable.example: Eg: Let customers pick between a red or blue pen.

manufacturable.title: Manufacturable
manufacturable.example: Eg: A mug and sticker bought separately, assembled and sold together.

dropship.title: Dropshipping
dropship.example: Eg: Furniture shipped directly from the manufacturer to the customer.

stepThree.title: Pricing
stepThree.content: How much do you sell it for?

simple.title: Sale status
simple.content: Is this item for Sale, or for internal use?

simple.title: Buying
simple.add: You bought this product before? Just add it.
simple.create: Please fill the form about the product you bought and intend to sell. You can leave it empty and add leter.

manufacturable.title: Bills Of Materials
manufacturable.selectVariations: Please add the used bills of materials for the product

location.content: This you physical location, where the inventory is located.  More locations can be added via Shipping Address in settings.

name.content: The name of your location.  For example:  Rack A, Shelf 3, Location: 12 could make: A-3-12.

description.content: Anything that helps you and your team understand this location.  Treat it as a note taking field.

precise.content: Is this location detailed and specific? For example, a location like 'Rack A, Shelf 3, Location 12' is very precise. On the other hand, a location described as 'Building 1' is not very precise.

prices.confirmCurrencyChange: The current changes will be lost, are you sure you want to change the currency?
prices.updatedError: Price for currency {currency} is wrong. Please adjust it!
prices.updatedSuccefully: The price for currency {currency} was succefully updated!
prices.createSuccefully: The price for currency {currency} was succefully created!
prices.updatedSuccessfully: The price for currency {currency} was successfully updated!

name.content: Name your pice list. Eg Wholesale Europe.

discountPercentage.content: This section indicates the percentage that will be deducted from the pricelist price, reflecting the discount applied.

currency.content: The currency for the price-list. For example EUR.

customers.content: Optional field, if you want this price-list to be used for specific customers only.

vatIncluded.content: If you're selling including VAT, eg to end consumers mark as True. For trade customers, mark as False.

autoUpdate.content: Enable it if you want to auto-update the prices for all the products based on currency changes.

dateRange.content: Specify the start and end dates for the price list to be active. Leave these fields empty for a permanent promotion. This is useful for setting up temporary promotions.

product.addLater: This can be empty. You can add the products later.

show.title: Image
show.updateFailed: Failed to update the image. Please contact the administrators!

show.title: Video
show.unsupportedFormatError: This video format is not supported by your browser!
show.updateFailed: Failed to update the video. Please contact the administrators!

name.content: The name of the currency, eg: British Pound.

isoCode.content: Offical 3 letter code of the currency, eg: GBP.

symbol.content: The symbol for the currency, eg: £.

isDefaultCurrency.content: The standard currency for your organisation. There can be only 1.

inheritsFrom.content: What currency should the prices be converted against? Eg select GBP if you're creating EUR.

followOfficialRate.content: If you want to follow the official exchange rates, you should select this. If you have your own rates, mark this as False.

exchangeRate.content: Fill in your own rates in this field if you have them.

roundPricesUpTo.content: When prices are calculated for this currency, do you want to round them up to 1, or 10, or .95 etc.

comment.content: No special action here, just a field for note taking.

create.title: Create Demo Data
create.content: You can create demo data to explore the features of our application.

alert.title: Are you sure?
alert.text: This will create demo data in your account. Do you want to proceed?

create.succefullyCreated: Demo data will be added momentarily.
create.successfullyCreated: Demo data will be added momentarily.

delete.title: Delete Demo Data
delete.content: You can delete the demo data from your account.

alert.title: Are you sure?
alert.text: This will delete all demo data from your account. Do you want to proceed?

delete.succefullyDelete: Demo data will be removed momentarily.
delete.successfullyDelete: Demo data will be removed momentarily.

network.error: Failed to fetch data from the server. Please check your connection.
